summary: This document is a Bureau of Prisons count sheet and related forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York on August 9, 2019, showing inmate counts by housing unit and an inmate roster with assignments. It appears to be routine prison administrative paperwork from the day Jeffrey Epstein was in custody.

events.title: Daily inmate count at MCC New York
events.description: Routine inmate count conducted at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York, showing total inmate population of 758 with breakdowns by housing units.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center New York, NY
keyFacts: Document is dated August 9, 2019 - the day Jeffrey Epstein died in custody at MCC New York.
Shows total inmate count of 758 at MCC New York with breakdown by housing units (B-A: 26, C-A: 10, B-N: 83, E-S: 79, G-N: 78, G-S: 88, H-A: 4, I-N: 86, K-N: 89, K-S: 137, R-A: 0, Z-A: 73, Z-B: 5).
Includes inmate roster with assignments including codes like 'SUICIDE OR SUICIDE OR UNASSG' which may indicate special monitoring status.
Document shows routine prison administrative procedures including out-count forms and official count slips.
No specific individuals are named in these administrative forms, only housing unit designations and counts.
